item.title: Npc wont talk 2 times? dialgouehandler.java
item.dc:creator: @F2p_Blackscape F2p Blackscape
item.description:
@F2p_Blackscape wrote:

I try to make the npc “grandpa jack” talk 2 times but it doesnt work.
i add it on actionhandler.java and it still doesn’t, i remove it from actionhandler.java and it still doesnt work
Dialoguehandler.java -----------------------

   case 106:
     sendNpcChat1("Welcome to F2p Blackscape, I am your fellow guide!", c.talkingNpc, "Grandpa Jack");
        c.nextChat = 107;
    break;
  case 107:
     sendNpcChat1("Go to the next tutorial man!", c.talkingNpc, "Grandpa Jack");
        c.nextChat = 0;
    break;

action handler----

	case 23000:
						c.getDH().sendDialogues(106, npcType);
	break;
	case 23001:
						c.getDH().sendDialogues(107, npcType);
	break;

if i remove the case 23001 from the action he wont talk, if i remove the case 107 in the dialoguehandler.java he will talk
what!@#$%?
plz tell me what to code or something thanks

Read full topic
